title: GitHub
extract: GitHub is a web-based version-control and collaboration platform for software developers. ... GitHub, which is delivered through a software-as-a-service (SaaS) business model, was started in 2008 and was founded on Git, an open source code management system created by Linus Torvalds to make software builds faster.
extract_html: GitHub is a web-based version-control and collaboration platform for software developers. ... GitHub, which is delivered through a software-as-a-service (SaaS) business model, was started in 2008 and was founded on Git, an open source code management system created by Linus Torvalds to make software builds faster.
